{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21672v1", "title": "Futaki invariant on Hopf manifolds", "summary": "The Futaki invariant is a fundamental tool in K\"ahler geometry representing
an obstruction to the existence of K\"ahler-Einstein metrics. Recently, it was
generalized to compact complex manifolds. In this paper, we prove that it
vanishes on Hopf manifolds.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-04-30T14:13:05Z"}
